questions.question: Finish the sentence: A product is correct if...
answers: You get an A+ on it

questions.question: What can't we achieve with software testing
answers: Reveal as many errors as possible
Determine that there are no bugs in the software

questions.question: What isn't a consideration when we design
answers: Where is the interaction taking place
How did the user hear about our product
What activities are being carried out

questions.question: What is the first rule in interface design
What is the visibility consideration in interface design
answers: The code should be written in small letters so people can't copy it
Secure the users data and encrypt them so they are not visible
How clearly does the user see the user interface, its state and the possible options
Can the user be seen while using our app
